Job Title: Supply Chain Manager

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Essential Duties and Job Responsibilities Procurement: Oversee and backup divisional buyers with day-to-day purchasing duties as needed. Negotiate contracts with strategic suppliers, including costs and terms of supply, service, and quality.Work on cost reductions, supplier reviews with scorecards, supplier rationalization, supplier development, lead-time reduction, consignment, long-term agreements, Blanket PO’s, and Terms & Conditions. Strong knowledge of metal procurement and metal machining services. Understanding of import/export logistics.Ability to strengthen current vendor relationships and development of new sources.  Inventory & Material Handling:Manage and work daily with warehouse manager regarding inventory control, shipping and receiving, and materials storage and handling.Maintain optimum inventory levels to ensure on-time deliveries meet customer requirements while minimizing carrying costs and transportation charges.Work with CFO to performs write-offs on damaged or obsolete inventory to reflect the accurate value of inventoryEstablishes procedures for conducting and valuing year-end physical inventory with Warehouse ManagerMonitor inventory adjustments and conduct cycle counting
ERP Management:Develop ERP objectives in alignment with overall company objectives, meeting current and business needsIdentify, recommend, implement, and support ERP solutions. Work with in-house ERP software programmers, engineers, and managers towards efficient solutions.  Experience & Education RequirementsBA or advanced degree in supply chain management, logistics, or other business-related disciplines.Professional certifications such as CPSM, CPIM, CSCP, or other related certifications are preferred. Min 5 years in Supply Chain, Purchasing or Materials Management or related field required.Experience with ERP systems.APICS certification a plus Experienced with lean manufacturing principles and six sigma training preferred.Strong software skills including Excel, PowerPoint, Word, and Outlook.  Job DetailsSchedule: Monday – Friday with flexible time schedules with options for working a 9/80 schedule with every other Friday off. Salaried Position- Approximately $80,000 per year depending on experience.Benefits: We offer our employees a competitive benefits package, including Medical, Dental, Vision, 401K with Match, 10 paid Holidays, 3 weeks of Paid Time off, and Continuing Education opportunities including tuition reimbursement program, and company parties, and lunchesAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteranEOE, including disability/veteransLocation: Salt Lake City, Utah

Experience Level (if available): None
